name: Circuit (caseyscreamsback)
description:
TURN ON THE LIGHT.

Use L and R arrows to move the ball machine.  

Press Down Arrow  to drop a ball.  

Hit the light switch with a ball to turn on the bulb!  

Be careful!  Don't unplug the light!

PRESS ENTER TO START...

Made for Mini Jam 103: Darkness
All assets were made by me except the music, used under license from artlist.io
